= Introduction =

Knock allows you to scan subdomains, Transfer Zone discovery, Wildcard testing with internal or external wordlist.

Only for use the <a href="http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/DNS_zone_transfer">Zone Transfer</a> option (*-zt*) you must install the module <a href="http://www.dnspython.org/">dnspython</a>, otherwise you can do without.

=Usage=
  <code>$ python knock.py <option> <url></code>

==Rapid Scan==
  <b>Scanning with <u>internal</u> wordlist:</b>

  <code>$ python knock.py <url></code>

  <b>Scanning with <u>external</u> wordlist:</b>

  <code>$ python knock.py <url> <wordlist></code>


<h3>Options:</h3>

  <b>-zt</b> <u>Zone Transfer discovery:</u>

  <code>$ python -zt knock.py <url></code>


  <b>-wc</b> <u>Wildcard testing:</u>

  <code>$ python -wc knock.py <url></code>

  <b>-dns</b> <u>Dns resolver:</u>

  <code>$ python -dns knock.py <url></code>

= Executable on Linux =
 <a href="http://code.google.com/p/knock/downloads/list">Download knock</a> and extract file _knock.py_

 From shell command:
 <code>$ sudo chmod a+x knock.py</code>

 Now you can use knock as shown in the examples.

= Examples =
 <b>Scanning with <u>internal</u> wordlist</b>

 <code>$ ./knock.py _domain.com_</code>

 <b>Scanning with <u>external</u> wordlist</b>

 <code>$ ./knock.py _domain.com wordlist.txt_</code>

 <b>Zone Transfer discovery (-zt)</b>

 <code>$ ./knock.py -zt _domain.com_</code>

 <b>Wildcard testing (-wc)</b>

 <code>$ ./knock.py -wc _domain.com_</code>

 <b>Dns resolver (-dns)</b>

 <code>$ ./knock.py -dns _domain.com_</code>

==Sample stdout to file==
This will cause the ouput of a knock to be written to a text file

<code>$ ./knock.py domain.com > output.txt</code>
